welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hillcrest Heights, a charming city known for its picturesque views and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tipton AAF Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Tipton AAF Airport is exclusively for military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private flights and features a lounge for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lee Airport offers domestic flights to various destinations within the United States.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Lee Airport offers flights to select international destinations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Washington Dulles International Airport serves international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Washington Dulles International Airport serves domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Washington Dulles International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D at Washington Dulles International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
